scripts.build:dist: npm run clean:dist && npm run build:shared && npm run build:client:prod && npm run build:server:prod && npm run copy:files
scripts.build:client:prod: cd client && NODE_ENV=production npm run build
scripts.build:server:prod: cd server && npm run build && cp -r dist ../dist/server
scripts.copy:files: cp -r client/../dist/client dist/ 2>/dev/null || echo 'Client files copied'
scripts.clean: npm run clean --workspaces && rm -rf node_modules dist
